meanings.sent1: I always keep extra backups of my favorite snacks in case I run out.
meanings.sent2: Having backups of important documents is a good idea in case something happens to the originals.
meanings.sent3: My friend jokingly offered to be my backup dancer at the talent show.
meanings.sent4: She is like a backup plan, always ready to step in and help when needed.
meanings.sent5: The backup supply of batteries saved the day when the power went out.

meanings.sent1: I will backups you in the game to make sure you win.
meanings.sent2: Friends always backups each other through tough times.
meanings.sent3: The little girl asked her teddy bear to backups her during the scary movie.
meanings.sent4: His encouraging words were like a warm backup on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The kind stranger offered to backups the lost tourist find their way back.

meanings.definition: A copy of data or files made in case the original is lost or damaged
meanings.sent1: Make sure to create regular backups of your important photos on the computer.
meanings.sent2: Storing backups of your work on an external hard drive can prevent data loss.
meanings.sent3: The computer technician recommended setting up automatic backups to avoid losing any files.
meanings.sent4: Having a backup of your thesis saved me from a lot of stress when my laptop crashed.
meanings.sent5: The cloud storage service offers secure backups for all your important documents.
